caption:
Table 2: Comparison of learnt representations versus the state-of-the-art. Results are averaged 
over all splits. The "Mod." column shows which combinations of modalities are used by the 
methods, possibilities: Vision, Audio, Text, Flow. Dataset abbreviations: AudioSet, HowTo100M, 
Instagram65M [25], SoundNet [9], 2M videos from YouTube8M [4], Kinetics600; their length in 
years is given in the "years" column.  â€  [74] uses a non-linear classifier. We report top-1 accuracy for 
UCF101, HMDB51, ESC-50, Kinetics600 and mAP for AudioSet.
